article.title: Doing Business with the AfDB
article.summary: Tips for success, opportunities, and suggestions for enhancing your bidding chances.
article.content:
How to Work with the AfDB?

â€‹

Tips for Success

  • Contact AC-AfDB
  • Liaison with Executing Agency
  • Visit the AfDB
  • Get bid documents early
  • If interested in bidding, send expression of interest to executing agency
  • Find local partners
  • Register on the AfDB DACON System.
  • http://www.afdb.org/en/projects-and-operations/procurement/

Opportunities

  • http://www.afdb.org
  • http://www.devbusiness.com/
  • http://buildingafricatoday.blogspot.com/ (the AfDB Private Sector blog)

Enhancing your Bidding Chances with AfDB

  • Prioritize Countries
  • Visit those priority countries from time to time
  • Link up with local partnerships
  • Network with local firms, AfDB, and administrating agency (eyes, ears, and feet on the ground)
  • Understand rules and procedures
  • Understand regional preferences
  • Visit AfDB website regularly
